doc:
Billy Burke (actor) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Billy_Burke_(actor) 0 William Albert Burke (born November 25, 1966) is an American actor. He is known for his role as Charlie Swan in Twilight and its sequels. In 2011, he played Cesaire in Red Riding Hood. In 2012, he was cast as the lead character, Miles Matheson, in the NBC science-fiction series Revolution. From 2015 to 2017, he starred in the CBS series Zoo. He has also appeared in the supernatural horror film Lights Out (2016) and the thriller Breaking In (2018). William_Albert_Burke ( born November_25_,_1966 ) is an_American_actor . He is_known for his_role as Charlie_Swan in Twilight and its_sequels . In 2011 , he played Cesaire in Red_Riding_Hood . In 2012 , he was_cast as the_lead_character , Miles_Matheson , in the_NBC_science-fiction_series_Revolution . From 2015 to 2017 , he starred in the_CBS_series_Zoo . He has_also_appeared in the_supernatural_horror_film_Lights Out (_2016_) and the_thriller Breaking In (_2018_) .
